Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Config
    Provides access to configuration.
    GameEngine
    Central game management module.
    GameLoop
    Main game loop.
    GameSystem
    Performs work on entities matching a certain component signature.
    Launcher
    Provides a framework to configure and launch Pancake games.
    Launcher.LauncherConfig
    A builder of basic configuration options.
    Limiter
    A timer which is ready after a set number of seconds have passed.
    PerformanceCounter
    Provides global access to performance counts.
    PerformanceCounter.Usage
    Tracks the average time usage of a game system.
    Resources
    Provides access to resources.
